relation: Only two more bookings are required for this holiday to reach 'Guaranteed' status.

pageTitle: Slovenia Snow Spectacular Winter Activity Holiday | Dates & Prices | KE Adventure
textBeforeTable: * Against Land Only services. BOOK WITH KE CONFIDENCE - No surcharge guarantee* Small groups The minimum number required for this holiday is 6. However we can run this multi activity holiday for smaller groups at additional cost. --> Prices and itineraries shown for trips departing in 2012 may be subject to change although we will endeavour to keep any price increases for 2012 trips to a minimum. 2012 prices will be confirmed in October 2011. If you have already booked a 2012 trip and the price subsequently rises by more than 10%, you may cancel with a full refund.
